attributes.title: This was not a good idea
attributes.review: ✨🪐 So basically it all started off as a really simple thing. 🧚‍♂️Just downloaded this orange 🍊 supporters app . When I tell you as soon as I downloaded this app MY POWER WENT OFF i mean it 😨. I asked my mother if it was because she didn’t pay the light bill . But she responded and said no. I was really concerned and thought to myself. Could it be? Is this app really cursed. I let that  1 coincidence of my power turning off slip . But then I kept having dreams about the app and some ninjas  and it saying “VOTE FOR TRUMP & RATE THE APP A 5 STAR” I was honestly in shock 😣. I thought to myself “it’s just my mind playing games” but then I woke up and had my breakfast and I KID YOU NOT NINJAS !!! NINJAS !!! Were at my house. Yes, not even I believed this. They were doing exactly what had happened in my dream. If I have to download this app and have these weird occurrences I will not refer this app to ANYONE. What happened to me was very bad. I would never wish anyone to go through the same . Oh my. As soon as I was about to send this review. Some unknown number called me . Of course I didn’t answer, but they kept calling me. I decided to block the number but now this other number keeps calling me. If this review even gets to send it will be very much appreciated. If I could give this app 0 stars , I legitimately would .
